84-613.Cash Reserve Fund; investment; interest.

Any money in the Cash Reserve Fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act. Any interest earned by the fund shall accrue to the General Fund.

SourceLaws 1983, LB 59, § 6;Laws 1986, LB 870, § 2;Laws 1987, LB 131, § 2;Laws 1988, LB 391, § 1;Laws 1995, LB 7, § 147;Laws 2004, LB 1090, § 3;Laws 2006, LB 1131, § 2;Laws 2006, LB 1256, § 10;Laws 2007, LB323, § 4;Laws 2009, LB456, § 4.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
